name: Ultimate Taxi Simulator 2018
description:
Fasten your seat belts for taxi driving and become fearless taxi driver!!
Get the title of real taxi driver for meeting all missions of taxi driving!!



Drive taxi cab at high speeds and don’t let curvy paths and treacherous turns slow you down by taxi racer. The passengers are waiting for taxi driver 2018, So HURRY UP!!



Game Play Tips:

- Dn’t let the taxi petrol be finished, fill the petrol first.
- Follow traffic rules during taxi driving, in case you will earn more money.
- The faster you complete the mission, more money you will earn.
- Unlock multiple new taxi cabs for unlimited fun of taxi simulator 2018.
- Dn’t break traffic signals otherwise you will have to pay fine of 50$ at every each signal.




Game Play Modes:

- Career
- Racing
- Free Ride



Key Features:

- 3D camera views
- Challenging missions
- Plenty of taxi cab selections
- HD graphics of taxi driver 2018
- Smooth control of top taxi simulator.
